html: Last week, my House colleagues and I voted to reopen the government – and this week, we’re doing it again. The House just voted to fund the Treasury Department and the IRS to ensure tax refunds are not delayed. I urge the Senate to take up this bill and end the #TrumpShutdown.
text: Last week, my House colleagues and I voted to reopen the government – and this week, we’re doing it again. The House just voted to fund the Treasury Department and the IRS to ensure tax refunds are not delayed. I urge the Senate to take up this bill and end the #TrumpShutdown.

html: Trump promised to drain the swamp and should have fired Pruitt a long time ago. Instead, he was allowed to rack up ethics violation after ethics violation. His record on the environment is even worse. His replacement should know that we will fight this assault on the environment.

html: When we should be reuniting children separated from their families, the GOP immigration bills spend billions of dollars on a wall & don't protect Dreamers or asylum-seeking families. Voting NO on both bills. Speaker Ryan needs to work on a bipartisan & humane immigration bill.

text: Thank you for your thoughtful suggested questions for Secretary DeVos! I wish I could have asked them all but I will submit them to her to answer for the record. I focused on getting justice for students who have been defrauded by predatory for-profit schools.

html: After almost 2 years in office, Secretary DeVos will appear before the Ed & Workforce Comm tomorrow. What would you like me to ask her?
